articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: ‘I’m playing for my country’: Ukraine’s Svitolina thrashes Russia’s Potapova - The Guardian
articles.description: A fired-up Elina Svitolina thrashed the Russian Anastasia Potapova 6-2, 6-1 in Mexico and said it was her mission to unite the tennis world behind her country
articles.content:
Tennis
  • Ukrainian defeats Russian opponent 6-2, 6-1 at Monterrey Open
  • Svitolina: Im doing my best to invite people to support Ukraine
Dressed in Ukraines blue and gold colour… [+2789 chars]

articles.title: Veteran TVB actress-host Samantha Chuk dies aged 55 - AsiaOne
articles.description: Veteran TVB artiste Samantha Chuk has died of lung cancer at age 55. In a Facebook post on Wednesday (March 2), TVB Entertainment News said the Hong Kong actress-host died at home in her sleep on Tuesday night surrounded by family. [embed]https://www.facebook…
articles.content:

articles.title: Malaysian actress' face smashed by 6kg bowling ball in wheelchair accident - AsiaOne
articles.description: Mishaps occasionally happen during filming and unfortunately, Malaysian actress Sheila Rusly's accident involved a 13-lbs (6kg) bowling ball. The 50-year-old plays a disabled bowler in a new drama series called Ratu Ten Pin and her character Mem Maria uses a …
